name: typedoc-github-wiki-theme
description: An extension of the default theme from typedoc-plugin-markdown to create a compatible file structure for Github Wiki pages.

scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn run lint && yarn run build && yarn run test
scripts.build-and-test: yarn run build && yarn run test
scripts.demo: rm -rf ./demo && yarn run build && typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --plugin typedoc-github-wiki-theme --options ../typedoc-plugin-markdown/demo.options.json  --tsconfig ../typedoc-plugin-markdown/test/stubs/tsconfig.json --theme github-wiki --out ./demo

author: Thomas Grey
